pulltitle: Fix a bug where banners might not appear until a resize
pullsbody:
r? @ngokevin 

The height of the element might be `0` until it gets painted so we need to wait for a paint to happen before checking the height.

pullsbody:
This adds karma, mocha and chai.

There was a regression when the close animation was added that caused
the mkt-banner to not be dismissed when it wasn't visble since the
transitionend event would not fire. The banner will now always be
dismissed after 500ms and it will be immediately dismissed when it is
first created if it has been dismissed and dismiss="remember" or
dismiss="session".
pull_repo_desc: Custom HTML elements for the Firefox Marketplace
pull_commit_message: Testing with karma, mocha and chai

pullsbody:
This adds karma, mocha and chai.

There was a regression when the close animation was added that caused
the mkt-banner to not be dismissed when it wasn't visble since the
transitionend event would not fire. The banner will now always be
dismissed after 500ms and it will be immediately dismissed when it is
first created if it has been dismissed and dismiss="remember" or
dismiss="session".
pull_repo_desc: Custom HTML elements for the Firefox Marketplace
pull_commit_message:
Fix mkt-banner not auto-dismissing (bug 1172707)

There was a regression when the close animation was added that caused
the mkt-banner to not be dismissed when it wasn't visble since the
transitionend event would not fire. The banner will now always be
dismissed after 500ms and it will be immediately dismissed when it is
first created if it has been dismissed and dismiss="remember" or
dismiss="session".

pulltitle: v0.7.0 reintroduce dist/ to distribute a .css file
pullsbody:
- I'd rather not have the consuming projects have to build the CSS file themselves since they would then be required to have `lib` folder and Stylus variables and such.
- Wonder if I'm allowed to symlink the JS folder
- Sets up splitting up elements into their own file
pull_repo_desc: Custom HTML elements for the Firefox Marketplace
pull_commit_message: v0.7.0 reintroduce dist/ to distribute a .css file

pull_commit_message: v0.3.0 mkt-section

pullsbody:
`<mkt-banner success>` becomes `<mkt-banner theme="success">`

Add all the themes, also add support for a light version.

`<mkt-banner theme="success-light">My banner</mkt-banner>`

![screenshot 2015-01-10 20 53 18](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/211578/5694154/ab994bb8-990a-11e4-98b8-5140fcfbd3de.png)
pull_repo_desc: Custom HTML elements for the Firefox Marketplace
pull_commit_message:
Banner themes for all actions

This is a backwards incompatible change.
The default theme is now "success" instead of "firefox".
<mkt-banner primary> becomes <mkt-banner theme="primary">

pulltitle: Make close button styles generic in marketplace banner
pullsbody:
Previously the styles were specific to the only banner that was using the close button (the incompatibility one), but there is going to be other banners using it, so make it generic.

Needed by mozilla/fireplace#823
pull_repo_desc: Custom HTML elements for the Firefox Marketplace
pull_commit_message:
Make close button styles generic in marketplace banner

Previously the styles were specific to the only banner that was
using the close button (the incompatibility one), but there is
going to be other banners using it, so make it generic.
